text: The Gibraltar men's national field hockey team represents Gibraltar in international men's field hockey and is controlled by Gibraltar Hockey. ==Competitive record== Gibraltar has never qualified for the Summer Olympics or the World Cup. They have however participated once in the European championship, in 1978 where they finished 12th out of 12. ===European championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|EuroHockey Nations Championship record |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 1970 |rowspan=2 colspan=8|Did not participate |- | 1974 |- | 1978 |11th place game||12th||7||0||1||6||4||27 |- | 1983 until 2021 |colspan=8|Did not qualify |- !Total||12th place||1/18||7||0||1||6||4||27 |} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=11|EuroHockey Championships record |- !Year !Level !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 2005 |III||3rd||5||3||0||2||19||12|| |- | 2007 |III||colspan=7|Did not participate|| |- | 2009 |IV||1st||6||5||1||0||22||9|| |- | 2011 |III||3rd||5||3||0||2||17||17|| |- | 2013 |III||5th||5||3||0||2||17||14|| |- | 2015 |III||colspan=7|Did not participate|| |- | 2017 |IV||1st||4||4||0||0||32||5|| |- | 2019 |III||3rd||5||2||2||1||14||8|| |- | 2021 |III||colspan=8|Qualified |- !Total||colspan=2|Highest: III||30||20||3||7||135||65||– |} ===Hockey World League and FIH Series=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|Hockey World League & FIH Series record |- !Season !Position !Round ! ! ! * ! ! ! |- |2012–13||Unranked |Round 1||4||1||2||1||7||11 |- |2014–15 |colspan=8 rowspan=2|Did not participate |- |2016–17 |- |2018–19|| |Open||5||1||1||3||8||15 |- !Total||–||1st Round||9||2||3||4||15||26 |} :*Draws include matches decided on a penalty shoot-out. ==References== Category:European men's national field hockey teams National team Field hockey men
